instanceVariables.name: identifier
instanceVariables.desc: The game-wide identifier of this piece of loot.

instanceVariables.name: pickupRangeBonus
instanceVariables.desc: Used to extend the range at which this loot can be picked up.

instanceVariables.name: destinationX
instanceVariables.desc: Where the loot should end up on the X axis.

instanceVariables.name: destinationY
instanceVariables.desc: Where the loot should end up on the Y axis.

instanceVariables.name: level
instanceVariables.desc: The level of this piece of loot. Currently only used to restrict player utilization.

instanceVariables.name: value
instanceVariables.desc: The value of this piece of loot, in coins.

instanceVariables.name: simpleName
instanceVariables.desc: The internally referenced name of this piece of loot.

instanceVariables.name: fullName
instanceVariables.desc: The beautified name of this piece of loot.

instanceVariables.name: type
instanceVariables.desc: The overarching type of this piece of loot, e.g. head, offHand, etc.

instanceVariables.name: lore
instanceVariables.desc: The cosmetic-only lore for this piece of loot. No effect on gameplay.

instanceVariables.name: mods
instanceVariables.desc: Which mods this piece of loot has.

instanceVariables.name: classRestrictions
instanceVariables.desc: Which classes are allowed to utilize this piece of loot.

instanceVariables.name: sound
instanceVariables.desc: Which type of sound to use regarding this piece of loot.
